104.comments: Important note to students taking 100 level PHYS courses in Term 1:The course previously known as PHYS101 is now called PHYS131 and does not contain a lab component. Those who want to or need to take a lab, should consider PHYS119 which will be offered in both T1 and T2.

TA1.comments: All tutorials sections are online for Fall 2020W Term 1.Important note to students taking 100 level PHYS courses in Term 1:The course previously known as PHYS101 is now called PHYS131 and does not contain a lab component. description: Fluids, harmonic oscillator, travelling waves, standing waves, sound, and interference of light waves, including diffraction. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: [Link to:www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414 ]
